text:
Sec 13(b)(3) provides an exemption from
the OT provisions of the FLSA for “any employee of a carrier by air subject to
the provisions of Title II of the Railway Labor Act”.
html: Sec 13(b)(3) provides an exemption from the OT provisions of the FLSA for “any employee of a carrier by air subject to the provisions of Title II of the Railway Labor Act”.
